data.blankContent: The American spadefoot toads are of typical shape to most digging frogs. They ____ round, with ____ legs ____ eyes ____ stick ____. This ____ has a hard ____ on ____ feet ____ helps ____ to ____. They dig backwards into the ground.
data.partBlankContent: The American spadefoot toads are of typical shape to most digging frogs. They a__ round, with sh___ legs a__ eyes th__ stick o__. This fr__ has a hard gro___ on th___ feet wh___ helps th__ to d__. They dig backwards into the ground.
data.answer: 美国黑足蟾蜍是大多数挖地蛙的典型形状。它们是圆的，腿短，眼睛突出。这种青蛙的脚上有坚硬的生长物，这有助于它们挖掘。他们向后挖到地下。
